summary: a retexture of the imperial full face helmet, steel plate boots,gloves, armor and imperial sword
descriptionHtml:
this is a retexture of the full face imperial helmet, steel plate boots, steel plate armor, steel plate gloves and imperial sword.
i am trying to make it a standalone mod, any help on how to do so would be much appreciated.
future updates:
-standalone armor
-a female version
-light armor version

INSTALLATION:
1.) save file into desired place (preferably desktop for easy drag and drop)
2,) open skyrim data folder (program files->steam->steamapps->common->skyrim->data)
3.) drag and drop downloaded folder with textures in it into the skyrim data folder
author: aronwb88
